title: Who You Want To Be - My first League of Legends Montage - Thresh

embed.description: I am glad to release my first League of Legends Montage, hope you enjoy :) Don't forget to subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/takemelolz?sub_confirmation=1 Music provided by NCS: Warptech ft. Cory Friesenhan - Resolution: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0hNdLnEbS68 Rootkit - Isolate (ft. Joe Erickson): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlXMO-Tnx34

replies.body: Invece di giudicare il video in se giudico le plays, alcune sono davvero fantastiche e fanno capire come mai i supp possono benissimo carryare i game, tutti quei predict.... poveri nemici.
